abstract: Three Afghan civilians are killed and four injured by suicide car bomb attack on American troop convoy; Taliban claims responsibility; 10 people are killed by roadside bomb in separate incident.
lead_paragraph: A suicide car bomber attacked a convoy of American troops in eastern Afghanistan, and in another eastern province, 10 people were killed when their minivan hit a roadside bomb.

headline.main: Afghanistan: 13 Civilians Killed in 2 Separate Blasts
headline.print_headline: Asia; Afghanistan: 13 Civilians Killed in 2 Separate Blasts

snippet: A suicide car bomber attacked a convoy of American troops in eastern Afghanistan, and in another eastern province, 10 people were killed when their minivan hit a roadside bomb.
